interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz
Review Date: 2021/09/27
Store: Gryph & IvyRose
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'}
Review Text: My youngest daughter has Eczema and struggles with  dry itchy skin. This lotion worked well at keeping her skin hydrated, without causing any irritation. We have also ordered the Gryph & IvyRose Shampoo & Conditioner and it works well for her also. Love this brand!!
Review Title: Great for my daughter with eczema!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count SOOAE {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Great stocking stuffer! Womens’ Metallic Finish Non Slip Grip 48 Counts 2 Inches Hair Bobby Pins Gray DARONGFENG {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.61 x 2.52 x 0.35 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '788465401296'} Good quality bobby pins that hold really well. I haven't seen the gray color in stores so it was really nice that you could order this color on Amazon. Great bobby pins, Love that you can get them in the gray color! Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK HAMUULL {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'} I love these silicone face scrubbers, they exfoliate the skin so well and are easy to clean. Just place a dab of your favorite facial cleanser on the scrubber and go to work. It helps with creating a rich lather and exfoliating all of the skin. Great for exfoliating the skin! Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} These gel polish shimmer colors are beautiful and perfect on their own with two coats or over top of a base color coat. They cure easily with a UV light and are chip resistant for almost 2 weeks.

Very durable polish and great selection of colors in this set! Great gel polish, perfect shimmer colors to go over a base color coat! Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy AYL {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} I have been slowly switching my cleaning products over to more environmentally friendly and wanted to start investing in glass spray bottles and soap dispensers as well. These are just beautiful, the perfect size and came packaged very well to keep the glass from breaking in transit.

These are just as esthetically pleasing as they are practical and I will be purchasing more in the future. I loved the personal touch of the note inside from the seller as I always love to support small businesses. These spray bottles are great if you are in the market do not hesitate to purchase them. Beautiful Amber Glass Spray Bottles! Dip Powder Nail Starter Kit 8 Colors Acrylic Dipping Powder System for French Nail Manicure Nail Art Set, Portable Kit for Trave, No LED Nail Lamp Needed… Colorfairy {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Colorfairy', 'Included Components': 'Dip Powder, Nail Lamp', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 4.17 x 2.72 inches; 9.77 Ounces'} Overall this kit worked well, but I will say use the directions shown here online and not the ones on the back of the packaging that this kit comes in. On the instructions posted here it goes over which steps need to be repeated and give more detail.

This stuff is super strong once it is on and my daughter still hasn't been able to remove all of it completely. We are going to have to look up the best removal method for dip powder, but the top coat does dry quickly and is very smooth and shiny.

Looking at the polish you can almost see the granulated powders. It still leaves a pretty finish, but the glitter appears to be more professional looking since you cannot really see that it is a powder underneath the top coat. Worked well, but finish is a little different than your normal polish! GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 GERSHION {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} I love these spring colors in this assortment of gel polishes! They are super pretty shades and these worked well with my other gel base and top coats. It cured perfectly and has lasted well without chipping/peeling. Worked great with my other gel base and top coats! Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Sulfate Free Salon Grade (2 x 16.9 fl oz) - Hydrating Toner - Shimmer Correction for Platinum Blonde, Silver, Light, and Grey Hair - New Formula BELLISSO {'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Shine,Restoring,Nourishing', 'Brand': 'BELLISSO', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Scent': 'Green Tea,Natural', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.86 x 6.02 x 3.11 inches; 2.91 Pounds', 'UPC': '765066671129'} My daughter has a natural dirty blonde hair color with some blonde balayage mixed in and this purple shampoo and conditioner really helps to keep her blonde from appearing brassy/yellow. Great for twice a week use and maintenance of her color. Love that it is sulfate free and these bottles are large enough that they will last her quite some time. Great quality purple shampoo & conditioner for my daughter's naturally blonde hair with highlights! Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask | Butt & Thigh Booty Mask | Lightweight Wash Off Type Butt Mask for Cellulite, Stretch Marks, Skin Detox, Ingrown Hairs | Skin Firming and Clearing Booty Mask Formula for Sensitive and All Skin Type | Formulated with Collagen, Rosemary Extract, Centella Asiatica, and Other Natural Ingredients | 100% Natural, Cruelty-free | 2.7 oz PROOT ['Our skin nourishing Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask Mask is power packed with collagen and other natural ingredients. Its innovative and natural booty masking formula is infused with collagen and centella asiatica extracts to give your booty super supple and clear booty complexion.', 'Our skin nourishing Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask Mask is power packed with collagen and other natural ingredients. Its innovative and natural booty masking formula is infused with collagen and centella asiatica extracts to give your booty super supple and clear booty complexion.', 'Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask works to gently detoxify and purify skin by drawing out impurities, oil and environmental toxins.', 'Our Butt & Thigh Clarifying Wash Off Mask works to gently detoxify and purify skin by drawing out impurities, oil and environmental toxins.', 'Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance and stabilizers, our booty mask is packed with natural and innovative formula that helps reduce fine lines and cellulite, replenish moisture levels and relieve dryness.', 'Free of synthetic color additives, fragrance and stabilizers, our booty mask is packed with natural and innovative formula that helps reduce fine lines and cellulite, replenish moisture levels and relieve dryness.', 'Suitable for all skin types.', 'Suitable for all skin types.', 'No paraben, No silicones, No animal tests, No artificial color', 'No paraben, No silicones, No animal tests, No artificial color', 'Dermatologist tested, Gentle on sensitive skin.', 'Dermatologist tested, Gentle on sensitive skin.', '2.7 fl.oz', '2.7 fl.oz', 'Directions: On clean & dry skin, apply a thing layer to your booty for 15-20 minutes. After masking, please wipe the mask with a towel or wash off in a shower. Use 2-3x per week.', 'Directions', ': On clean & dry skin, apply a thing layer to your booty for 15-20 minutes. After masking, please wipe the mask with a towel or wash off in a shower. Use 2-3x per week.', 'Ingredients: Water, Kaolin, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Beeswax, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Polysorbate 60, Bentonite, Vinyl Dimethicone, Polyglutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract,Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Carbomer, Arginine, Fast Acid Magenta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Allantoin, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA', 'Ingredients', ': Water, Kaolin, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Beeswax, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Polysorbate 60, Bentonite, Vinyl Dimethicone, Polyglutamic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract,Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Carbomer, Arginine, Fast Acid Magenta, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Allantoin, Panthenol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Fragrance, Disodium EDTA'] {'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Butt Mask', 'Scent': 'Rosemary', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Sensitive, Dry, Normal', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.4 x 6 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} This clarifying mask makes your skin feel smoother, but as far as clearing acne on your inner thighs or lightening dark spots it doesn't help at all. I've been using it regularly for 2 week now with no improvement. It does make your skin feel soft and smooth so maybe better used for smoothing the buttocks. Doesn't help clear inner thigh acne or lighten dark spots as I was expecting! 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, 2pcs Waterproof Mascara & Fiber Set, Longer Thicker Voluminous Eyelashes, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day Arlega+ {'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'Arlega+', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.69 x 2.8 x 1.06 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '193995030692 193995032320'} This mascara makes my lashes look voluminous without clumping and is easy to wash off, but also provides great waterproof coverage. It is easy to apply and looks beautiful, I like to use the fiber when I'm really wanting fuller voluminous lashes like for date night or a special occasion. Works great as only a mascara or along with the fiber that is included! Back Acne Treatment Spray | Bacne Cure Treatment Spray | Clears Back Acne, Body Acne, Chest Acne, Butt Acne, Ingrown Hairs & Razor Bumps | Formulated with Natural Ingredients, Cruelty-free | 5.1 oz PROOT {'Item Form': 'mist', 'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Item Volume': '5.1 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7 inches; 7.48 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} My teen daughter has hormonal acne all over her back, chest and shoulders. This spray is perfect as she can apply it herself daily after showering. It has improved the clarity of her skin and reduced redness as well without over drying her skin. Great for my teen daughters Bacne! Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz Gryph & IvyRose {'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'} My youngest daughter has Eczema and struggles with dry itchy skin. This lotion worked well at keeping her skin hydrated, without causing any irritation. We have also ordered the Gryph & IvyRose Shampoo & Conditioner and it works well for her also. Love this brand!! Great for my daughter with eczema!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user maintains a strong preference for gel nail products, skincare tools, and body masks targeting skin firming and detoxification. Their interest has expanded to include eye makeup, particularly volumizing mascaras, as well as dip powder nail kits and pastel gel polishes. They are also drawn to vibrant, eco-friendly hair care products and skincare solutions addressing body acne, with a new focus on moisturizing products suitable for children’s sensitive skin.

- **Quality Focus:** High-quality, durable, non-toxic, and cruelty-free beauty items remain a priority. The user values products with modern, sustainable designs that align with their ethical values.

- **Purchase Behavior:** Their recent purchases reflect a commitment to comprehensive beauty routines, emphasizing eco-conscious choices and effective solutions for various skincare concerns, including those tailored for family members.

- **Color Aesthetic:** The user favors vibrant and pastel colors with shimmery finishes, enhancing their style while ensuring product efficacy.

- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Enthusiastic about home beauty routines, they focus on maintaining quality and functionality across nails, skincare, and eye makeup.

- **Packaging Preference:** The user prefers eco-friendly packaging that reduces environmental impact.

- **Review Engagement:** They are actively engaged in providing detailed feedback, promoting best practices in beauty routines, and supporting small businesses. Their recent review highlights their interest in products that cater to specific skin issues, particularly for children.
